overview:
Udi Trugman is co-founder and VP of R&D for Cotendo, he has over fifteen years experience and holds multiple patents in the development of intelligent content management systems and commercial server software.

Prior to co-founding Cotendo, Trugman led Commtouch Software’s development efforts as Vice President of Research and Development with notable achievements including patents and industry-leading software for recurrent pattern detection and content management systems. Previous roles at Commtouch include Senior Director of systems development in the research and development group. Prior to working at Commtouch, Mr. Trugman specialized in the development of enterprise business systems software as well as specialized logistics applications.
